roleset.name: to criticize
roleset.note: SCOLD-V NOTES: Frames file for 'scold' based on WSJ; nominal 'scolding' based on BOLT-6. Member of Vncls judgement-33. (from scold.01-v)
SCOLDING-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from scolding.01-n)

example.name: all arguments
example.text: But he-1 did fly to Panama [*-1] to scold dictator Torrijos on the drug ties of Panamanian officials , including Mr. Noriega .
example.arg: on the drug ties of Panamanian officials , including Mr. Noriega

example.name: nominal rel: scolding
example.text: His scolding them for keeping the primary race going would just feed into the image of Mr. Obama thinking he is better than the average voter.
example.arg: for keeping the primary race going
